Lambsquarters are flowers that come and go with the seasons.

The muchacho was not careful. He passed the warning signs and decided to hold a siesta in the kudzu field. The kudzu grew so fast, he was completely covered by it in a few hours and not able to escape. Now, the kudzu flowers mark his grave.
Mr. T is a kind master and gives his servant a magic wand for his birthday.
Why is my package late? Imagine a UPS driver dressed in brown garments taking a siesta. What can brown do for you?
I like a nice glass of water when I take a siesta nap, but if I use up all of my clean glasses I have to use my vase.
When a chaste woman is a victim of a crime Mr. T likes to play detective and detect the heck out of that fool!
When I yawn around lunch time I know it's time to take a rest and have a siesta.
Your fingers end the siesta when they remove the blanket and reveal your body.
The vulture is on top of the porter and appears to be commiting a promiscuous act, so I throw water over the pair of them.
In the royal court, if the judge has an erect index finger it means off with his head..
Mr. T knows that to rule you need to think outside of the box, i.e. in a lateral way.
Hanging from the ceiling a plow and fishhook dripping with blood down onto the tile bathroom floor.
Mr. T plans to steal all one hundred million fishhooks in the world to stop the overfishing problem.
If you don't have any porcelain to make dolls, tile is a secondary option. Might be hard to craft though.
A pottery bottle that has been dropped on the floor is like a puzzle of ceramic tiles to glue together.
In the future you can get an indestructable metal spine made from aluminum.
"House with a spine, Shinto shrine. House with a backbone, palace and a throne"!
The firehouse's engines in this country have a lustrous jade color.
Fireflys are the only insects the workers in the firehouse enjoy.
Laborers like gardeners often scoop up things with their fingers.
The sled dogs faces are glowing while they warm up in front of the fire.
A banner advertising this crazy zoo with an elephant ride where the elephant's trunk whirls you around until you've had enough.
When you give someone a kiss it's like two mouths making a knot together.
If you are hurriedly trying to undo a knot it might be useful to drop some oil on it for lubricant.
Tin is soft, bends easily, and melts at a low temperature. Hence tin is written as the metal that is easy to work with.
Rich areas have watchful neighbors which allow you to rest easy at night with a relaxed state of mind.
Mr. T tastes a new restaurant you show him and he wants to repay you because it was so good.
The flag got burned by the candle and now all that's left are bits.
Animals use their urine (body water) like a flag to mark their territory.
Mr. T claims that an angel came to talk to him in a dream and said he should live abroad and help people once he is finished fixing all of the problems in the USA.
You use a saber like a paint brush to make an artistic looking towel by slicing a flag design into it.

Mr. Rhinoceros doesn't see well, so to prevent an unwanted attack, I don't surprise him. I always approach waving a flag attached to my walking stick. I've drawn a picture of a snowflake and an attractive cow on the flag, so Mr. Rhinoceros will stay calm when he sees it.
Mr. T purchases 100 Chinese acres of land all on an incline because he loves to leave his house and ski down the incline and into town in the winter time.
Mr. T becomes a lifeguard because he believes there is no better way of starting strong human relationships than saving a drowning person.
Rhinoceros road is always blocked by the rhinoceroses, so don't take it or you mind be tardy to work.
Water can always leak in the spot left by the flag planted in the roof everytime the rain came. Not too hard to picture a hole left in the ceiling from a flag, now leaking water.
You haven't smelled a fart like his! His were so bad, that when he cut one, they had to wave a flag to keep folks away. None compare to the farts that he farts.
You are asleep in camp when you are woken up with news that the flag has fallen to the enemy. You quickly put on your footwear and go double back to restore the flag.
After eating a lot of rice my excrement was so impressive that I put a flag into the ground where I took my massive dump as a memorial.
This folding screen looks quite pretty, with all the national flags printed on it, but folding and unfolding it is rather complicated. It looks more like a puzzle than a utility item.
When yielding, soldiers raise the white flag with a knuckle under it before exiting from the trenches.
If you excavate with your fingers hard enough, soil eventually yields. Then you can put your knuckle under it to dig more.
Capital 'R' for ruler. Doesn't get much easier than that.
The eyebrows hover over the eyes like a divided flag.
If you want to flatter a woman just raise your eyebrows at her a couple of times and wink!
The shoulder is the best part of the body to bash a door open with.
The first time your woman walks through the door while you are being naughty she will be jealous of your other female friends for the rest of your relationship.
Mr. T approaches the knights and stabs his scissors into the table they're seated at. "I pity the fool who questions my chivalrous person ality!".
The chihuahua finished all of its water you left outside and now stands in front of the door in tears waiting to be let in.
Behind closed doors, the taskmaster and his mouth are more personable and disclose information that enlightens you about his way of thinking.
It's insanely hot today! I'm standing in the doorway, fanning myself with feathers.
The St. Bernard dog is dying of old age and laying on the altar. The faithful people say "We can't help but we can pray!"
A bank can substitute for shells (money) your contractual promise to pay them back with interest. This is called a loan.
The soldier is on the altar, preaching about funds for the new swords. The audience just yawns however, they want to see the man fight!
The evil spirit exits the spirit world through the altar when you cast a spell.
The teenager receives a cloak as a wish well present.

Bringing a sheep to sacrifice on the altar was a sign of a propitious (presenting favorable circumstances) life. The poor could only afford a pigeon, the more auspicious brought an expensive sheep for an offering.
The altar boy knows the priest will certainly keep confidential what he discloses during confession.
After the typhoons in Shenzhen an assembly line of people pick up the thicket and broken trees off of the floor (streets in this case) which were blown around from the strong winds.
A military officer must offer console-ation to the hearts of the families of his fallen men.
The factory boss yells orders at his workers but when the assembly line can't hear him they just shrug their shoulders and continue working.
Military officers make good gardeners which means they can grow luxuriant flowers.
In the temple were two altars. One of them had the usual array of flowers, but the other was adorned with garlic, so that the locals could pray to keep the vampires out.
In the salem trials people would charge falsely other people for being witches just because they said a few words which were out of the ordinary.
The palm tree brings to mind the Rostafari religion in the warm climate of the Caribbean.
Jack's beanstalk sprouted up, pushed at the roof, shot into the universe, and lifted the house so that it hangs in mid-air suspended on the sprout.
Imagine a car going across a plain at a fast speed. Suddenly a single sprout (the only one to be seen) gets stuck to the car's axle, causing the car to fly around its axis.
The bad magician says, "As you can see, there's nothing up my sleeves!" Then he trips over his cloak and brussel sprouts fall everywhere.
A cool flute made of bamboo sprout.
The female monkey will lay in the comfortable soil while she is trying to relax. The men hang around in the trees.
Monkeys aren't really complainers but they can let a serious groan out of their mouths if there aren't enough bananas around.
You're appointed to take the proof to the court but the wind blows it away.
This chill monkey talks smoothly and often tells people to take it easy.
A good partnership can generate many fruits (benefits).
The shellfish lost his job but redeems himself by selling seafood at the local city market. He knows all the best sources in the ocean.
The smart birds decided to build a nest in the fruit tree so they could have a neverending stream of fruit. No more nasty digging for worms!
The fruit tree is a perfect symbol for the measure word 'flora' for green things in Chinese.
By means of your fingers you can simulate tons of different animals. Kids know this very well.
Here we have Adam and Eve eating the forbidden fruit, realizing they were naked, and so clothing themselves in a cloak.
The banana man is just a piece of fruit who likes to envelop his body not only with his natural fruit skin case but also with a top hat and scarf.
People try to analyze how many trees have been cut down with an axe or other tool.
The spine of ancient China was a big house called the palace where all of the important decisions were made.
Before it was just day and night, but humans then learned the distinct times of days from analyzing the sun (reading sun dial).
These days you can get a replacement metal knee but in the future you can get a metal spine. Just make sure it's not a cheap doctor using aluminum!
The axe murderer glares at his flower garden victims "First Celery, Parsley, Sage, Rosemary, and Thyme!".
This greenhouse does a firefly show at night because it's an insect everyone loves and it lives well with the plants.
You accidently chopped off a couple of fingers with an axe so when you decided to return it the ax shop gave you a discount coupon.
My precious jade (green gemstone) is so lustrous (smooth/bright/glowy) that I hide it in my greenhouse to keep it safe. It blends in with the green plants.
Philosophers get discounts in all stores in the future because of their low income but good words coming out of their mouths.
A road whose stores offered everything at a discount had to pass away as the rent was too high to continue the discounts.
A shop uses its words and vows to give people a discount if they aren't satisfied.
My first job was in an ice cream shop where my labor was to scoop up ice cream with my fingers and glop it onto a cone.
I was elated about playing with an axe when I was a kid but now it makes me yawn.
You uncover a gift with your fingers and you're elated because it's just what you wanted.
If anybody at the alter refuses to supplicate (ask humbly for something) in prayer, and instead asks rudely, they get the axe.
Onions will suddenly grow flowers if they get too old.
Your state of mind is conscience-stricken when you are about to hew (chop) off the top of your car. You feel bad for the car.
Tin foil might be the easiest and cheapest metal to get ahold of.
Towering over the rest of the land at the top of the mountain is the mountain man holding his only tool, an axe which he uses to hew stuff.
You reprimand your kids because they take apart household objects with their fingers and don't put them back together.
The Louvre museum is like a magic wand for Chinese people. Tell them you'll take them there and they'll do anything you want. Even renounce their own flag!
A car is on fire and getting totally fried, but civilians free the driver by cutting the door open with a saw before the car can blow up.
Although Chinese people spread throughout the world, generation after generation they keep a flag in the drawer to remind themselves of their heritage.
Pinnochio gets frustrated that every time he utters a word of a lie when he tries to swindle (cheat out of money) someone, his nose grows and he has to get the saw out again.
Ten rakes woman. your wife digs her fingernails into you and it feels like 10 rakes when she finds you ontop of another woman.
When your a wife is miserable lots of tears (water) come out.
My wife wanted a special place to perch herself and roost, so I built her one - on top of that tree.
The old lady goblin has on her hairnet while she uses the cooking fire to cook up some potions for the taskmaster
If you want the bus to drop you off and work and you are tardy, just run down the road waving a flag so the bus drive can see you.
Ten detectives follow the trail of footprints pointing with their fingers at which way the rake murderer might have gone, but he's way to nimble for them and will never be caught!
I wield a rake everytime I do my wild rice farming - my go to weapon for work.
The snowman likes to peel off the hard icey layers around the outside of his body with his saber arms that the children gave him.
We mutually ended the relationship because she used all of the money for her crown collection while you picked fruit to survive.

Our ninja hero, disguised as a gardener with a double handle rake lives a double life. He is suddenly attacked from both left and right concurrently by bulls with animal horns. Our hero lets out a blood-curdling scream and tears his rake handle vertically in half, so he now has two wooden staffs (split rake handle) to fight with. He grips each staff (left side and right side) and rams it into the horns of the charging bulls. The force of each charging bull causes the tips of each staff to split again (split bottom of each rake handle).
If you have double the shells this year that you did last year then you earned something.
Naturally, if you're double dating, and by that I mean dating more than one woman concurrently, they will certainly dislike each other!
You see the rice woman flag time and again which means someone has come to deliver your rice.
I'm usually unassuming but if someone uses double the necessary words and starts studdoring, they might just be lying.
If you yawn once during a conversation it's okay, but a double yawn calls for an apology.
Stores don't want you to know it, but if you find the secret cave, they run inexpensive bargains there. The other suckers are paying double price!
Sickles are an inexpensive weapon made from metal because they are commonly sold to farmers who need to afford them.
I see a load of bamboo for sale at a inexpensive bargain price and decide it’s so cheap that I’ll buy it and make my own bamboo drapes.
The ruler's favorite thing about daybreak is the soft daylight hitting his eyes.
I was trying to get to sleep, contending with my eyeballs, but they remained unshut all night until I finally fell asleep in the morning.
You have a conversation (mouth) behind closed doors which enlightens you.
When in a struggle with another, people always use their fingers to fight or contend.
People contend with bamboo sticks to win an expensive Chinese zither (stringed instrument).
After the storm there was a pool of tangy stuff in the ground. I thought, maybe it will give me super powers. On second thought, maybe I'll turn green and drop dead on the spot, so I left.

This stove is equipped with a fire-proof door. On the hanzi you can see somewhat pictographically the fire-proof door keeping the fire behind, and nothing comes under the door primitive, where you would have expected to see another primitive.
Think police roadblocks. They act like road sieves, letting good people through but arresting criminals.
You must play a tune using a hollow reeds, to open the secret door hidden beneath the flowers.
The bondservant takes care of the annoying work like making a new broom from a tree. The butler then takes care of easy stuff like sweeping the altar.
When your body is hale it affects your state of mind and makes your more generous and giving.
Don't eat chaff (worthless garbage) food. Have some hale and hearty rice.
Don't mess around with a woman when it comes to hair brushes or combs!

Much more stately than that soil podium, this is made of chilly ice. You can still see the dude standing behind it in his top hat, and he still spouts pretty much nonsense as many times as he can, but you have to admit his showy altar is quite stately.
My comb is rust-proof, water-proof, and fire-proof. But unfortunately it is not idiot-proof--and I glued it to myself.
I left my favorite comb on the mountain top so I went all the way back up to get it but my mouth was gasping for air and my chest was wheezeing by the end. Damn asthma!
I held up a comb with my fingers to gauge the width of the mountain. Seemed kilometers wide but it was merely conjecture.
This cadet messed up and couldn't resist digging into his private rice stash during his training in which they were doing a hunger exercise.
Close encounters of the third kind. The space cadets meet with aliens on the road.
Also as part of some army survival exercise, the cadets are sent into the woods to build a trough under a tree (for collecting water for example).
Trying to look at the Big Dipper while holding your telescope will never work because your fingers will quiver (shake back and forth). You need a sturdy stand.
To live a mediocre comfortable life, single men need only a cave for living, a rake for cleaning and a screwdriver for fixing.
I pity da foo' with no underlings! So, Mr. T put to work some janitor to make his life more comfortable.
Imagine a car going across a plain at a fast speed. Suddenly a single sprout gets stuck to the axle, causing the car to fly around its axis.
This is a rack of tails. Sometimes I take a tail off and fling it at my sister to get a kick out of her.
What a pity! My state of mind when i think of the opportunities I missed from times past. It makes me rue (bitterly regret) my past actions.
My cave is my temple and I go there after I sprout (get up) in the morning.
Long ago in times past our ancestors set aside the use of fingers and started to arrange dinner with cutlery.
In the US, when the mail is delivered, a flag sprouts up on your mailbox. The flag will fall due to the automatic sensor when you get the mail.
The parents of a really loud and annoying baby try to forsake (abandon) it twenty times but it keeps coming back...so they take off their belt, and buckle the baby to a tree!
Twenty birds (swallows) are perched at the north exit (北口) of the station, having a bbq with a little cooking fire and swallowing as much food as they can.
Commoners going down the road are randomly stopped and screened for drugs or weapons.
Having a monkey in the house would no doubt be painstaking work.
This farmer divides his rice field in half with a small pond in the middle. The littoral (shoreline) of the pond is where each side of his field starts.
About half of my fingers blend in with and look like the others. My thumbs and pinkies are much different however.
The auntie is a painstaking woman who works a 9-5 and come home to to the cooking and cleaning as well.
When a beautiful individual wants you, half of you wants to stay true to your partner, but the other half wants to go against and betray.
The monkey and piglet might be very different animals but they are both still cute and smooth enough to pet.

Entering the movie, the dude asks for your voucher, so he can tear it in half. He looks at you funny when you hand him a ticket already torn in half. He quietly tears the stub into quarters after you show him your dagger with a smile.
According to legend, the great rattan palm tree grew and flowered from magical rice grains that were planted under the quarter moon.
This is a nice state of affairs in which someone's chihuahua always sleeps on the bunk beds. She can choose either bunk！
The assembly line has to stare at the inner walls of the factory all day until they return home to their small group homes with soil floors and bunk beds.
Back in the day there were really cool old cooking pots that sort of resembled bunk beds which people used to cook all sorts of stuff like this eyeball stew.
The class dunce plans class pranks before he get some shuteye at home on his bunk beds.
Mr. T invades the French maid; driven wild by her little broom, dainty tiara and sinfully short skirt showing her knickers (crotch)!
The French maid draws a bath of water for her amorous master, but slips and falls in - getting immersed.
Surfboarding is fun but surfers leave their stuff on the beach and are always reporting stolen goods like their shells.
The underling isn't allowed to join the parade but he goes anyway and tries to hide under the flowers on the top bunk of the bunk bed float.
My state of mind was conscience stricken when I didn't know whether to hew down the old tree and put it out of its misery, or watch the legendary old thing rot.
That body will be difficult to hide with all the guts coming out like that. Better get it into a bag first or something.
The general's St. Bernard dog wins an award for saving him during battle.
In Hong Kong they had to hew down a lot of forest at the base of mountains to make room for towering sky scrapers.
The general gets sick of water and only drinks thick liquids like rum or whiskey.
Zhejiang province is famous for its discount water.
A tree can be used for something as general as looking at and appreciating or for making weird things like oars (paddles).
General Jiang used to be a famous Chinese general and so the people would put flowers around him in celebration.
The abyss [old] used to be the water you were pushed into if you lost in the arm wrestling match.
This carpentar uses his fancy saw and words to swindle people out of their money when they pay too much for his poor work.
A solemn monk always carries on the same tasks without worrying. He rakes rice whether he is in the field or staring into the abyss.
When the female soldier is able to come back from war she is happy to resume a relaxing life with a broom instead of a saber.
Standing at the top of the grand canyon, most people are tempted to let out a long howl with their mouths.
A hairnet or hair covering of some sort is a normal sign of an old lady with wrinkles. The young girls want to show off their beautiful hair.
The grand canyon is a pretty desolate place with little life except for some flowers here and there.
If the grand canyon were metal, it would have to be rusty since it's an orangy brown color.

Zorro, with a flower between his teeth for the ladies, defends his turf where he harvests black sesame. "This is my turf! And this...is for the lady, as he hands her some Chinese black sesame pudding.".
If you work in a restaurant and have long hair you better wear a hairnet. When you hasten your walk while cooking, your hair will be all over the place.
Investors are weary about stocks being devalued because they will lose all their shells.
The turkey with the hairnet over there takes care of all the chicks while their mothers are recovering.
I'm weary of any large bodies of water. If the boat starts sinking when you are deep sea fishing, it will be hard for any rescuers to pinpoint your nonspecific location.
After work, the French maid goes home and lies down with a turtle to get some shuteye. Turtle? Well, he's sloooow and always hard... (thanks to Nukemarine and Wakela!).
In the debate, your political opponent's perspective is really askew. He believes the negative is actually correct.
Angels have now been given a powerful tool to rectify human behavior instantly, without delay - they have been allowed to drop darts on those who misbehave... spare the dart and spoil the man...
The reason spidey always has a whisk broom is because he eats beef every night and makes complete mess.
As the dart community becomes smaller overtime the dart committee is a little short of stature in the public eye. No one really cares what they have to say anymore.
Wheat farmers get anxious because their income isn't always stable.
When the warrior finishes battle he puts down his crossbow and makes a sort of sigh--ay-ay sound with his mouth.
If you work as a laborer outside with your fingers, you will always have to fend off bugs as they buzz in and bother you.
The freshly carved and sanded crossbows drop fine dust on the ground when releasing arrows.
Peel off the outside of the broom that sweeps up rice grains to reveal a saber.
In the busy pub, one of the dart players shoved his dart into my elbow by accident when it nearly slipped out of his fingers. Someone always has to suffer in a drunken dart game.
The bamboo tribe likes to light a cluster of bamboo every night to stay warm. Bamboo is more in abundance than wood.
To harvest the crops (flowers) you've grown you hit the thatch (plant stalk) with your halberd.

The tangerine is a type of tree which sometimes yields poor quality fruit. In such times, instead of simply standing up and inviting customers to make a deal, a salesman must force the sale of tangerines by brandishing a halberd and forcing the customer to make a deal by purchasing your substandard fruit.
The ice wife (from Siberia maybe?) suffers the miserable winter every year!
To relax I go to my countryside abode which my company bestowed on me after 20 years of service.
If you pull the bow back with your elbow so as not to get your hands dirty, like a true noble man, you can also shoot a vast distance.
Even though it's a maddening task the monks stay solemn as they rake rice between the fence posts and snack on animal legs.
A barbarian isn't much different from a St. Bernard. They both like to swallow everything and this one has swallowed a bow (you can see the shape of the bow sticking through his skin).
Some people think that when wolves howl with their mouths they are in distress, but they are actually in a solemn state of mind.
Your maternal aunt isn't very polite but she makes you feel safe because she's pretty much a female barbarian.
Despite desolate living conditions the mountain monk remains solemn meditating in front of the flowers.
In this house there was a dividing line created through the middle ground of the house after a family fued in which one of the sons shot the father with a bow and arrow.
If you want to earn double the shells just work some O.T.
Mr. T goes for a massage after every family fued he has because all of the stress gives him a stiff neck.
The family leaves the flowers to the mom, but when she goes grocery shopping they always have a family fued over what kind of tea she buys because half of them only want ginger tea.
Rice porridge gives you the strength to use two bows at once.
When people are unassuming you don't need to speak double the number of words (repeat yourself). They wait patiently and let you finish your sentences.
My restaurants get dollars from dishes that are based on foods you need to bring to a boil in water to get them right.
Other people make dollars massaging in which they caress people with their fingers.
A normal knife is inexpensive, but a sickle is a more pricey piece of metal.
The younger brother wants to look cool and shaves himself with a saber instead of a razor.
You try to make your partner happy by contending with your eyes to make them unshut during that painfully boring romance movie.
Your sloppy younger brother seems to blow more snot than he does drink water.
The tree was a little too high, but, hey, no problem, I'll just use my younger brother as a ladder!
At the end of the day basketball is just fingers contending with each other in a struggle to get that ball in the hoop.
This snare isn't terribly effective, because it's swinging from a tree that's decayed. When an animal gets caught in the snare, it struggles causing the tree to collapse into a putrid mess.
The Chinese zither is a stringed instrument. This is a bamboo one whose sound can contend with any other kind of zither.
My company will employ anyone who listens well with their ears, sprouts quickly when it comes to learning, and will not get snared by daily problems.
The most common servant of the bondservant is shoveling snowflakes off of his master's long driveway.
At a fiesta different cultures sacrifice different animals like a cow or sheep. This culture doesn't like using animals so they put together a bunch of wheat with a snare and sacrifice that instead.
In my family my elder sister is the woman who is responsible for catching food in the forest which is why she is always dragging a snare.
Somebody well esteemed is in a position of great comfort to be able to lie down any time they want. No 9-5 job.
For somebody to dodge floud water, it's all about knowing the right high location to go to, not just running fast.
The pole of the bamboo mop is of course made from a bamboo shoot.
Somebody sitting on a stoop with a bow - sounds like a city guy about to get out of town to enjoy the outdoors for the weekend.
This old man can sometimes hanker (strongly desire) for his favorite meal. You can just see his tongue wagging in the mouth as the food is being served.
When you take an exam with shaky fingers and fail it in this school, you will get a good flogging afterwaards.
Ahh, a fine day of summer heat with my puppet under the hot sun. I think he's getting a tan!
I made my puppet's favorite dinner for her, put it down on the table and said "Behold"..... her eyeballs practically popped out.
My puppet likes to gamble for shells.
A life-size St. Bernard dog puppet would be an extravagant but really cool guard dog.
My apartment building grounds are managed by my puppet so she always has to make a stop up here to this floor, a stop down there to that floor etc.
Here I am boiling my puppet over the cooking fire to warm her up a bit...
Because i get tired of saying the same old thing, I have lately been trying to use various terms of endearment to my puppet. I think she appreciates it too.
Mr. T has faith that to put in storage his puppet is a good way to preserve her for as long as possible.
Dried meat is the way animal flesh was consumed in times past. Now we have BBQ!

Generals usually see their soldiers as mere puppets in their war game. These poor sods are given a flag and told to engage in a slaughter for their country. As if that would make good all the butchering.
Before you add your John Hancock to accept the puppet, you should eye over the puppet for any damages, then add your John Hancock.
In times past insects were hard to catch but now we have wax traps which the insects get stuck to.
In times past humans were like wild dogs, and had to hunt everything they ate. No we have farms.
The signature flower of Ireland: the yam! Speaking of which, how are yams different from potatoes?
The maestro has his maid catch fresh deer in the woods for dinner. He reminds her to follow her footprints to come back and, of course, put on the apron and pick up the broom as soon as she returns.
The teacher shows the children how to use bamboo to sift through the dirt and find food in a survival situation.
An excellent use of wood is to make coffins for bureaucrats.
A father with a newly adopted son will only get the title of "Dad" after many years of good parenting.
The father sits on top of an axe which he uses everyday.
When anything tastey comes to mingle with my mouth I bite down and enjoy immediately!
You have to be sly to mingle with a pack of wild dogs and get away unharmed.
To prostrate oneself a pirate must get down on one knee for eight seconds in front of the man with the wooden leg, the captain.
You have to watch your step when moving your leg on a watery day. You might slip and the busy crowd will trample you.
The shellfish is weary that people may not devalue shellfish unless the reputation is bad so he poisons people who eat shellfish to spread the belief that shellfish can be dangerous to eat.
The pirate with the wooden leg chased after the parade float and was run over by the next one, leaving tread on marks all over him and his leg.
After He lost a leg in combat, our sovereign king got a wooden leg as a replacement. Since he thought it was a little boring, he added a hoof for kicks.
In sports people use their legs to run and fingers to catch a ball.
An angel can rectify wrong doings by shooting a magic dart into the person which turns their soul good and forces them to do good things for the rest of their lives.
An old pirate isn't used to the main land where he only needs to step on the wrong type of surface with his wooden leg - before you know it someone is helping to pick him up.
The pirate's wooden leg is starting to crumble at the bottom from hop ping around on it too much and doing tricks for the other pirates while drinking rum.
If a pirate comes to lose his leg in battle, he just gets a wooden one. His performance will slump a bit but he will still be an effective pirate.
You stimulate a person by giving him a kick from which he will feel the urge to run.
It's easy to kick things super hard with a wooden leg because it won't hurt!
The impetuous (acting without care and too quickly) pirate tries to climb the tree to get the goods, but doesn't realize it's harder to come down than go up a tree with a wooden leg.
In this tree is a bird's most prized goods, her babies. They have their mouths open constantly chirping.
At the lake you can hang your goods on a tree when you take a bath in the water.
While taking a bath at the pond you see that the water has a strange color which matches the flowers and realize that algae caused it.
